definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Is no solution, so today to send to the forum.
sentences.chinese: 更是沒有解決的方法，所以今天發到討論區來。

sentences.english: Opinions expressed in this forum do NOT represent Hong Kong Ken Do Kai's point of view.
sentences.chinese: 討論區的內容不代表香港拳道會的意見或立場。

sentences.english: File upload in Portal and Forum is ready to use.
sentences.chinese: 於網站及討論區之檔案上傳工能已經開放。

sentences.english: This forum is provided for travelers planning to visit Bali.
sentences.chinese: 本討論區係爲準備到巴里島旅遊之遊客所設置。

sentences.english: Makes the comment area and the discussion much more personal and lively.
sentences.chinese: 它可揖讓留言區和討論區更加個性化和可愛活。

sentences.english: Using Web-based Forum to Facilitate Students to Learn Introduction to Computer. Science …
sentences.chinese: 以網路討論區輔助學生學習計算機概論。

sentences.english: I have an invision power board forum skin that I need to be modified.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個藝術討論區論壇風格，我需要進行修改。

sentences.english: Should we put this to the related discussion websites in China?
sentences.chinese: 把這件事情放到中國相關網站的討論區？

sentences.english: Please choose a page for any event. You may write in your thoughts in the comment area.
sentences.chinese: 請自行選擇您有興趣的活動討論區來觀看及參與討論。

sentences.english: Forum Icons now should be successfully installed onto your forum.
sentences.chinese: 討論區加圖已成功安裝成於您的論壇上。

definition: to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
self-media (news or other content published on independently-operated social media accounts)
